sellerCard.oneLiner: With 6 years of experience as a web developer
sellerCard.description:
Hey!
Welcome to my profile.

I am Danyal having more than 5 years of experience in WordPress LMS, Digital marketing, Agency website, woo-commerce, LearnDash course setup, and sales lead. 
I have finished multiple projects during this period. I am a professional-oriented developer and I believe in exceeding the customer's expectations with high-quality results by ranking them higher and increasing their sales lead.

I am providing all about Learning Management System(LMS) and Digital Marketing Agency Website related services.
Contact Me Now!
Thanks

description.content:
Hi, Do you want lms website / wordpress LMS website/ Learndash Expert/ Tutor LMS Pro expert? If yes then you are in the right place. 


Here are my Services :)

  • LMS Integration
  • Responsive LMS web design
  • FREE Premium Theme/Plugins (No Extra Cost)(GPL licensed)
  • Premium Webinar for Live Training Sessions 
  • Course Builder
  • Advanced Quizzing
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • Analytics
  • Membership
  • Subscription
  • Single Course Selling
  • Student Dashboard
  • Instructor Dashboard
  • Link LMS via ZOOM
  • And many More


I will setup an E-learning WordPress lms web and tutor lms according to your requirements.


Why choose me?


  • Reasonable Plan Cost

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide the licenses for the Themes and Plugins that you use on the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. If I will use any Premium Theme or Plugin, you might need to purchase it if you need lifetime support or updates. I only have a GPL license to use it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you write the content for the lms website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not offer content writing services. I am a designer and developer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I edit my wordpress lms website with ease after you deliver it?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: YES, you can edit your website easily. I will record some basic videos for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide domain and hosting services for lms website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't provide hosting/domain name registration services. But I can guide you.

reviews.comment:
Danyal was very patient and was able to make suggestions where needed. 
He was very knowledgeable and offered great suggestions.

Will definitely be doing g future projects with him.

Danyal did an EXCELLENT job with the website development project! His documentation was great through a guided video he produced, and he was incredibly polite and quick to respond throughout the process. I highly recommend working with him! 👍
Danyal was fantastic. He helped me with every question I had and delivered a great website. Very understanding of my lack of knowledge and changing requirements.

Danyal has done an amazing job for me , above my expectations! He really knows well the job and has solution and suggestion to go further . hE is highly implicate in the task. Don't hesitate to work with him.

Danyal was an absolute professional with top-notch documentation and polished work! He delivered everything ON TIME, stayed super responsive, and was incredibly polite throughout the process. Highly RECOMMEND working with him again! 🙌
